description.narrative: By end-2018, the institutions, families and other actors have capacities, evidence and exchange of experiences for inclusion, retention, quality, gender sensitivity and good treatment in education., which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By end-2018, children and adolescents â€“ with special emphasis on those in the most vulnerable zones â€“ enjoy greater opportunities for the exercise of their rights to education with quality, relevance and good treatment of students.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By end-2018, the institutions, families and other actors have capacities, evidence and exchange of experiences for inclusion,retention, quality, gender sensitivity and good treatment in education.

description.narrative: En 2018, UNICEF Ecuador apoyo la implementacion y sistematizacion de componentes de una estrategia territorial de inclusion y calidad educativa planteada al Ministerio de Educacion en 2017. Los componentes apoyados fueron: acompa?amiento pedagogico, escuelas multigrado, nivelacion, educacion basica superior acelerada, prevencion de la violencia y agua, saneamiento e higiene. | Status:Met | As-of Date:24/01/2019

title.narrative: Existence of programmes to attend educational lag at the level of Secondary, with a gender approach

target.value: 2018:There is a programme to address educational lag at the Secondary level implemented in at least 4 prioritized education districts and available to be implemented by the Ministry of Education

title.narrative: Geographic reach of policies and programmes addressing the educational lag in General Basic Education, with a gender approach

baseline.value: One programme implemented in an urban locality

actual.value: 2018:Pilot strategy for educational inclusion of adolescent and young mothers designed and validated in secondary education
